sides.title: Ion Torpedoes
sides.ability: Attack ([Lock]): Spend 1 [Charge]. If this attac hits, spend 1 [Hit] or [Critical Hit] re  sult to cause the defender to suffer 1 [Hit] damage. All remaining [Hit]/[Critical Hit] results inflict ion tokens instead of damage.
